tool_description: Maps role permissions to specific system resources and actions with translation for different system formats.

role_id.description: Role identifier to map permissions for

permission_format.description: Target permission format: standard, aws_iam, azure_rbac, ldap_groups

resource_scope.description: Specific resources to scope the mapping to

include_inherited.description: Whether to include permissions from parent roles

error_messages: Invalid role ID: Role identifier not found or invalid format.
Unsupported system: Target system is not supported for permission mapping.
Invalid permission format: Use one of [standard, aws_iam, azure_rbac, ldap_groups].
Resource scope error: One or more specified resources are invalid.
Mapping failed: Unable to translate permissions to target format.
usage: Provide role_id, target_system, and permission_format. Optionally specify resource_scope for targeted mapping and set include_inherited as needed.

mapped_permissions.description: Permissions formatted for the target system

compatibility_score.description: Compatibility score between source and target formats
